title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Everything you need to know about qMechanic

faqs.question: How do I get started with qMechanic?
faqs.answer: Getting started is easy. Sign up for a free trial, download the mobile app, and you can begin conducting inspections immediately. Our onboarding team will guide you through setup and help you configure your vehicles and inspection templates.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required. You can explore the platform, run inspections, and see how qMechanic fits your workflow before committing.

faqs.question: How long does setup take?
faqs.answer: Most customers are up and running within a day. Our team handles the initial configuration, imports your vehicle fleet, and sets up user accounts. Training typically takes 30-60 minutes per user group.

faqs.question: Can I import my existing vehicle data?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We can import your fleet data from spreadsheets, existing software, or manual entry. Our team will help ensure all your vehicles, trailers, and equipment are properly configured from day one.

faqs.question: What types of inspections does qMechanic support?
faqs.answer: qMechanic supports walk-around checks, 12-week periodic inspections, GA2 government inspections, pre-trip and post-trip inspections, and custom inspection templates. You can also create your own inspection types for specific requirements.

faqs.question: Does qMechanic work offline?
faqs.answer: Yes, qMechanic is designed to work offline. Drivers and mechanics can complete inspections without an internet connection. Data syncs automatically when connectivity is restored, ensuring no inspection data is ever lost.

faqs.question: How are defects reported?
faqs.answer: When a defect is found during an inspection, it's immediately flagged in the system. Workshop managers receive real-time notifications, and a job card can be automatically created. Photos and detailed descriptions help technicians understand exactly what needs fixing.

faqs.question: Can I customise inspection checklists?
faqs.answer: Yes, inspection checklists are fully customisable. You can add, remove, or modify check items, set pass/fail criteria, require photos for specific items, and create different templates for different vehicle types.

faqs.question: How does job card management work?
faqs.answer: Job cards are created from defect reports or manually by workshop staff. Each job card tracks the work required, parts used, labour time, and completion status. Technicians can update job cards in real-time via the mobile app.

faqs.question: Can I track parts and inventory?
faqs.answer: Yes, qMechanic includes parts management with inventory tracking. You can log parts used on each job, track stock levels, set reorder alerts, and generate parts usage reports for cost analysis.

faqs.question: How is labour time tracked?
faqs.answer: Technicians clock in and out of jobs using the mobile app. This provides accurate labour time for each job, enabling precise costing and productivity analysis. Time can also be manually entered if needed.

faqs.question: How does qMechanic help with compliance?
faqs.answer: qMechanic automatically schedules inspections, tracks completion, and maintains a complete audit trail. Compliance dashboards show overdue inspections, and reports can be generated instantly for RSA audits or internal reviews.

faqs.question: What reports are available?
faqs.answer: Reports include inspection history, defect trends, compliance status, vehicle health summaries, workshop productivity, parts usage, and cost analysis. All reports can be exported to PDF or Excel.

faqs.question: How long is inspection data retained?
faqs.answer: Inspection data is retained indefinitely in the cloud. You can access historical inspections, photos, and documentation at any time. This ensures you always have records available for audits or legal requirements.

faqs.question: How does pricing work?
faqs.answer: qMechanic is priced per user, per month. We offer three plans: Inspect (€15/user), Job (€25/user), and Complete (€35/user). All plans include unlimited vehicles and inspections. Annual billing discounts are available.

faqs.question: What support is included?
faqs.answer: All plans include email support and access to our knowledge base. Professional and Complete plans include priority support with faster response times. Enterprise customers get a dedicated account manager and phone support.

faqs.question: Can I change plans later?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect at the start of your next billing cycle. Our team can help you determine which plan best fits your needs.
